column7: One of the most popular formulas in early stage
One of the most globally popular formulas for oceans and lakes
Updated formula of @wanninkhof1992. Note the coefficient of 0.251 is now closer to @ho2011, @ho2016, and @borges2004.
Measurement at ocean and coastal area
An equation for estuary/river environment but against only on winds based on extensive review. Note the K value here is much higher than ocean environment in high wind speeds  (e.g. @wanninkhof1992).
A equation for estuary environment from extensive measurement at Scheldt Estuary
Equations developed specially for Queensland estuaries
